intro: Notopleura tapajozensis, commonly known as the Tapajozensis morning glory, is a flowering plant native to the Amazon rainforest. It belongs to the Convolvulaceae family and is characterized by its striking, trumpet-shaped flowers that bloom in vibrant colors. The plant has heart-shaped leaves and produces a climbing habit, often winding around tree branches. Its botanical features make it a unique subject of study in tropical botany. Notopleura tapajozensis is also noted for its potential medicinal properties.
